snippet: With Russian armed forces holding a tight grip on the Crimean Peninsula, Parliament scheduled a public referendum on secession for March 16.
lead_paragraph: With Russian armed forces holding a tight grip on the Crimean Peninsula, Parliament scheduled a public referendum on secession for March 16.

headline.main: Crimea Vote Deepens Crisis and Draws Denunciations
headline.print_headline: Crimea Vote Deepens Crisis and Draws Denunciations
